ShortDesc: Number of currently allocated InCommands (i.e. successfully created by the InFactory and not yet released)

Desc: The i-th element of this array is the identifier of the Sampling Buffer for the i-th Report Definition in the RDL

ShortDesc: Source of the large packet up-transfer to the LPT Buffer
